Function Documentation

CategoryTree* applyRegionConfiguration (  const CategoryTree *  tree,
const RegionConfiguration &  config
) 
 

Applies region specific settings to a full category tree, producing a new tree conforming to the settings.

Parameters:
tree The full tree.
config Configuration for the region.
Exceptions:
MC2Exception if some icons aren't available on disc.

MC2String getCrcForTree (  const BinaryCategoryTreeFormat &  catTreeFormat  ) 
 

Calculate CRC for the binary category tree.

Parameters:
catTreeFormat The catebory tree to calculate CRC for
Returns:
String containing the CRC.

DefaultConfiguration* loadDefaultConfiguration (  const MC2String &  defaultConfigPath  ) 
 

Loads the default configuration for local category tree from file.

Parameters:
defaulConfigPath Path to the config file
Returns:
Pointer to an DefaulConfiguration object. NULL if the load failed.

RegionConfigurations* loadRegionConfigurations (  const MC2String &  regionConfigPath  ) 
 

Loads all the region specific settings from one file into different RegionConfiguration objects.

Returns:
A pointer to the configuration for all the regions. NULL if configuration invalid or missing.

void parseBinaryFormat (  BinaryCategoryTreeFormat *  binaryFormat,
vector< CategoryTree::StandaloneNode > &  categories
) 
 

NOTE! This function is implemented for use in unit test and should be reviewed before use from production code.

Parses the binary format into a vector of categories.

void serializeTree (  const CategoryTree *  tree,
LangTypes::language_t  language,
BinaryCategoryTreeFormat *  format
) 
 

Serializes a category tree to our unified binary format.

Parameters:
tree The category tree, must contain at least one category. The binary format is unspecified for an empty tree, we should consider that to be an error and send an error code instead.
language The language to serialize for.
format The output data.
